alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 12:50PM EDT until March 14 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Monroe. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...4 to 6 inches have fallen in the highest elevations. The greatest snow totals will be at elevations above 1000 feet, with lighter amounts at lower elevations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
